hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Rooted in tradition, stirred with love — sharing Hyderabad’s enduring flavors, one handcrafted jar at a time.

story.title: From a Hyderabadi Kitchen to Your Table
paragraphs: Our story began in the vibrant lanes of Old Hyderabad, where the art of pickle-making was perfected in a modest kitchen. The rhythmic chopping of fresh vegetables, the aromatic roasting of spices, and the careful layering of ingredients filled the air with irresistible scents.

What started as a way to preserve seasonal produce for a family soon became a cherished tradition. The secret lay in time-honored recipes and the dedication poured into every jar. Neighbors were drawn by the tantalizing aromas, eager to taste the legendary mango pickle or fiery mixed vegetable pickle.

By the early 1990s, word had spread beyond the neighborhood. Local shopkeepers began requesting regular supplies, turning a small-scale passion into a thriving word-of-mouth business. Customers still share stories of traveling across the city to secure a jar of our iconic pickles.

Four decades later, we continue this legacy in a modern facility, using the same recipes preserved on yellowed paper. We source ingredients from trusted farming families and approach each jar with the same devotion that made our pickles a household name in Hyderabad.

timeline.title: Our Journey Through Time
timeline.subtitle: From a small kitchen in Old City to kitchens across the country—here's how our story unfolded.

items.title: Official Launch
items.description: The House of Pickles was established as a family business, moving to a dedicated facility while preserving traditional methods.

items.title: Digital Presence
items.description: Launch of our online store, bringing authentic Hyderabadi flavors to customers across India and beyond.

items.title: Today
items.description: Launch of our online store, bringing authentic Hyderabadi flavors to customers across India and beyond. Proudly serving thousands of families while staying true to our roots, with the same passion and commitment to quality.

quote.text: A pickle is not just food—it is memory, tradition, and love preserved in a jar. When you taste our pickles, you taste the stories of generations.
quote.attribution: Our family's philosophy, carried forward through generations

items.title: Our Address
items.details: Sultan Street, Old City, Hyderabad, Telangana 500002, India

brandStory.title: Authentic Flavors from the Heart of Hyderabad
paragraphs: For over three generations, our family has been crafting pickles using time-honored recipes that capture the essence of Andhra cuisine. Each jar is lovingly prepared with hand-picked ingredients and traditional methods that preserve the authentic taste of home.
From the tangy burst of raw mango to the fiery kick of red chilies, every pickle tells a story of tradition, love, and the rich culinary heritage of South India.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers

items.text: Absolutely authentic taste! Takes me back to my childhood in Hyderabad. The gongura pickle is exceptional.
items.author: Priya Sharma

items.text: Best pickle I've ever ordered online. The spices are perfectly balanced and the oil quality is outstanding.
items.author: Rajesh Kumar

items.text: My entire family is addicted to these pickles! The mango one is our absolute favorite. Quick delivery too.
items.author: Kavitha Reddy

details.name: Traditional Mango Pickle
details.description: Authentic Hyderabadi style mango pickle with aromatic spices
details.longDescription: Our Traditional Mango Pickle is crafted using time-honored recipes passed down through generations. Made with the finest raw mangoes, carefully selected spices, and pure mustard oil, this pickle delivers an authentic taste that transports you to the heart of Hyderabad. Each jar is prepared in small batches to ensure maximum freshness and flavor.

reviews.name: Priya Sharma
reviews.comment: Absolutely delicious! Tastes just like my grandmother's homemade pickle. The spice level is perfect and the mango pieces are so tender.

reviews.name: Rajesh Kumar
reviews.comment: Great quality pickle with authentic flavors. Packaging was excellent and delivery was quick. Will definitely order again!

reviews.name: Anita Reddy
reviews.comment: This pickle brings back so many childhood memories. The taste is incredible and you can tell it's made with love and care.
